Feature.Name: Arrow of Dragon Slaying
Feature.Text: If a dragon takes damage from this arrow, it must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking an extra 6d10 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much extra damage on a successful one. Once an arrow of dragon slaying deals its extra damage to a dragon, it becomes a nonmagical arrow.
